author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Snc-Lavalin Announces Agreement To Settle Class Actions Brought In 2012
text:
May 22 (Reuters) - SNC-Lavalin Group Inc:
* SNC-LAVALIN ANNOUNCES AGREEMENT TO SETTLE CLASS ACTIONS BROUGHT IN 2012
* SNC-LAVALIN GROUP INC - WILL CONTRIBUTE $88 MILLION TO SETTLEMENT OF BOTH CLASS ACTIONS
* SNC-LAVALIN- TO SETTLE 2 CLASS ACTIONS, BROUGHT ON BEHALF OF SECURITY HOLDERS, RELATING TO ALLEGED DISCLOSURE MISREPRESENTATION DURING 2009-2011 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
